title: Fallen Mate
description: Warning: the blurb below contains spoilers for the previous books in the series. If you haven't started the series yet, begin with Dark Prince.*The devil fell in love with an angel… and now there will be hell to pay.The first time I laid eyes on Lucas Hale—Lucifer—I should’ve turned and run the other way. But I didn’t. Instead, I agreed to work for him. I allowed myself to fall for him. I gave the Prince of Hell my heart……and now he’s taken it and disappeared.The gulf between us is like a hole in my chest, but I won’t let it break me. I can’t.Because Cephalus still wants me dead, and a new enemy is stalking me from the shadows. If I want to survive long enough to figure out the truth of who I am and find a way back to my soulmate, I’m going to have to play this game my way.Not as a pawn.But as a queen.Fallen Mate is a steamy paranormal romance where the villain gets the girl. It's the final book in the Chosen by Lucifer trilogy.
author: Callie Rose
